news.title: The AI lab revolving door spins ever faster
news.summary: AI labs just can't get their employees to stay put. Yesterday’s big AI news was the abrupt and seemingly acrimonious departure of three top executives at Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines lab.

news.title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing

news.title: AI video startup, Higgsfield, founded by ex-Snap exec, lands $1.3B valuation
news.summary: Higgsfield says it's on a $200 million annual revenue run rate. So it opened its previous Series A round back up and sold another $80 million in shares.

news.summary: Iran’s government-imposed internet shutdown enters its second week as authorities continue their violent crackdown on protesters.

news.title: Elon Musk’s Grok ‘Undressing’ Problem Isn’t Fixed
